metadata.Plot: When the seaside town of Shaw Bay is under threat of a redevelopment, realtor Erin will do anything to save it. Cue the handsome Theo, a royal looking for a new property. The catch is, he's hiding the royal part.
metadata.Actors: Brittany Bristow, Dan Jeannotte, Scott Wentworth
